news_header: Bolsonaro denies coup charges, claims political persecution, and aims for 2026 presidential run despite legal challenges.
news_original_title: Brazil: Jair Bolsonaro deplores Lula coup plot charges
news_text: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro condemned criminal charges alleging his involvement in a coup plot to overturn the 2022 election. He claims political persecution and compares his situation to that of opposition leaders in other leftist countries. Bolsonaro aims to return to the presidency in 2026, despite being banned until 2030 due to doubts cast on Brazil's voting system. Lula, the current president, stated that those charged are presumed innocent.
